snippet: Some unemployed parents and their children, who have an entrepreneurial spirit but lack the experience or capital to start a business alone, are deciding to join forces.
abstract: Laid off parents and their unemployed children, who have an entrepreneurial spirit but lack the experience or capital to start a business alone, are buying franchises together.
lead_paragraph: Some unemployed parents and their children, who have an entrepreneurial spirit but lack the experience or capital to start a business alone, are deciding to join forces.

headline.seo: With Bleak Job Prospects, Parents and Children Buy Into Franchises
headline.main: With Bleak Job Prospects, Parents and Their Children Buy Into Franchises
headline.print_headline: With Bleak Job Prospects, Parents and Their Children Buy Into Franchises
